snippet: In an effort to cut down on concussions, head trauma and other injuries, the Pacific-12 Conference is establishing a policy to limit the amount of contact made during football practices beginning this season.
abstract: Pacific-12 Conference, in effort to cut down on number of concussions, is establishing a policy to limit the amount of contact made during football practices; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: In an effort to cut down on concussions, head trauma and other injuries, the Pacific-12 Conference is establishing a policy to limit the amount of contact made during football practices beginning this season.

headline.seo: Pac-12 Moves to Limit Head Injuries
headline.main: Pac-12 Moves to Limit Head Injuries
